data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, Patricia S., Terossi, Mariana, Mantelatto, Fernando L., Almeida, Alexandre O. (2019): Using integrative taxonomy to establish the status of Alpheus peasei (Armstrong, 1940) (Decapoda: Alpheidae) as a single species throughout its distribution. Zootaxa 4629 (1): 51-68, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4629.1.4|54 occurrences
